name: Agent R
description:
Hello,

I hope you will have fun with our little game. 

First time for us to simply implement narrative apsects but we had some fun !

#NarrativeDrivenJam2

IMPORTANT : CONTROLS :

  • movement : wasd  
  • crouch : s 
  •  jump/shoot : space   
  • use : e
